actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution that the House of Representatives shall adjourn Monday, December 20, 1982, or on Tuesday, December 21, 1982, pursuant to a motion made by the Majority Leader, or his designee, in accordance with this resolution, and that when it adjourns on said day, it stand adjourned sine die.

summary.text: Provides for the sine die adjournment of the House of Representatives on December 20 or 21, 1982, and the Senate at any time before January 3, 1983.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution that the House of Representatives shall adjourn Monday, December 20, 1982, or on Tuesday, December 21, 1982, pursuant to a motion made by the Majority Leader, or his designee, in accordance with this resolution, and that when it adjourns on said day, it stand adjourned sine die.
